channel.title: Machine Learning on Giulio Barletta
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Giulio Barletta

item.title: Exploring machine learning models to predict atmospheric water harvesting with an ion deposition membrane
item.description: This paper presents a novel Ion Deposition Membrane-based approach to atmospheric water harvesting, leveraging machine learning to predict water yields under various environmental conditions. Published in Journal of Water Process Engineering, 2025.

item.title: MLWaterHarvest
item.description: This repository contains the database and notebooks related to the publication Exploring machine learning models to predict atmospheric water harvesting with an ion deposition membrane

item.title: Energy-GNoME
item.description: This repository contains the database, documentation, Python library (coming soon), and notebooks used to build the Energy-GNoME database.

item.title: Energy-GNoME: A Living Database of Selected Materials for Energy Applications
item.description: This paper presents the novel Energy-GNoME database and the related protocol. Preprint published on arXiv, 2024.

item.title: Learning Effective Good Variables from Physical Data
item.description: This paper presents two novel approaches to the discovery of possible groups or combinations of primitive variables. Published in Machine Learning and Knowledge Extraction, 2024.

item.title: GoodPhysVariables
item.description: This repository contains codes related to the publication Learning Effective Good Variables from Physical Data
